About Me

Hi, my name’s Antal Nagy and I’m a programmer and a lawyer. I have experience in data protection and information security. I also like making software and web apps.

My favourite programming languages are: Java and Python.

Projects

Python anonymizer

github.com/nagyantal9312/python_anonymizer

An app which is able to anonymize and pseudonymise data.

I started this project as a way of learning Pandas and Python. It is not a full app yet, it is in early development but I am updating it regularly and try to improve it.
